records.where_clear: Central Mediterranean Sea, off Malta's coast
records.context_note: Four migrant boats reported to Rescue Coordination Centres in the Central Mediterranean, including RCC Libya and MRCC Tunis. A magisterial inquiry cleared the Maltese Prime Minister and involved parties of criminal wrongdoing regarding the death of 5 migrants off Malta's coast.
records.evidence_quote: death of 5 migrants off Malta's coast.

records.location_details: At/around maritime border line between Turkey and Greece
records.where_clear: Maritime border between Turkey and Greece, Aegean Sea
records.location_text_raw: At/around maritime border line between Turkey and Greece
records.geocodable_query: maritime border Turkey Greece Aegean Sea
records.context_note: 61 migrants on a rubber boat were intercepted at the maritime border between Turkey and Greece and subsequently transhipped to a Turkish Warship P 1201.
records.evidence_quote: The 61 migrants on board of the rubber boat were transhipped to the deck of the Text Removed - Technical Equipment by its Text Removed - Reporting Tools with the assistance of Text Removed - Technical Equipment. At about Text Removed - Reporting Tools the 61 migrants on board of the Text Removed - Technical Equipment were transhipped to the TUR Warship P 1201.
